Felgt was developed by Lukas Feltes and Daniel Vogt as part of a student research project at the Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg Cooperative State University. \nThis app is still under development. We are looking forward to your support. Please send suggestions and criticism to felgt@0xd2.cf
